questions.question_text: Because a feature was not meeting documented requirements, a project milestone was not achieved as scheduled. Which of the following activities should the project manager perform NEXT?

choices.D: Schedule a meeting with stakeholders and update the project objectives.
choices.A: Calculate the schedule variance and update the project status.
choices.C: Review quality control processes and make the necessary improvements.
choices.B: Update the project scope and obtain sponsor approval.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Update the project scope and obtain sponsor approval should be the NEXT activity performed by the project manager because the project milestone was not achieved as scheduled.

When a project milestone is not achieved as planned, it is important for the project manager to determine the root cause of the issue and take appropriate corrective action. In this case, because the feature was not meeting documented requirements, it is likely that the project scope needs to be revised to address the issue. The project manager should update the project scope to reflect the changes that are needed to meet the documented requirements and obtain approval from the sponsor before proceeding with the project.

questions.question_text: A project manager is notified of a natural disaster that may occur during an active project's execution. Which of the following is the BEST option to maintain budget and scope?
questions.answer_description: A contracted business continuity firm enhances maintaining the budget and scope of activities while relocating in case of any natural disaster.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Secure an insurance policy in the event a disaster occurs is the BEST option to maintain budget and scope when a natural disaster may occur during an active project's execution.

A natural disaster can have a significant impact on a project, disrupting the project schedule, increasing costs, and potentially compromising the quality of the project deliverables. To minimize the impact of a natural disaster on the project, it is important to have contingency plans in place to ensure that the project can continue as smoothly as possible.

choices.C: Secure an insurance policy in the event a disaster occurs.
choices.D: Build lag into the schedule to accommodate average time lost.
choices.B: Accept that the disaster may alter deliverable quality.
choices.A: Contract a business continuity firm to provide for relocation.
